This exceptional item holds great value for me, and I believe it could be a valuable addition to your collection or needs. I am offering it to you at a special introductory price of $150. I trust its unique features and benefits will meet your requirements and exceed your expectations. Please let me know if this offer suits your budget and preferences. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $150.

(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $150
(2) Reject Alice's offer
